summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of multi-step agreement form page. All functionality working perfectly including navigation, form steps, validation, and UI interactions.
passed_tests: Form page loads correctly at /form route
Navigation from landing page to form via all CTAs (nav, hero, bottom, footer)
Progress steps indicator displays 4 steps correctly (Parter, Objekt, Villkor, Bekräfta)
Step 1: All Hyresvärd and Hyresgäst form fields present and functional
Step 2: Property type dropdown and date inputs working
Step 3: Payment method dropdown, security dropdown, and textareas functional
Step 4: Summary displays entered data correctly
Terms acceptance checkbox controls submit button state
Cancel button navigates back to home page
Form submission shows alert and redirects as expected
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
Form state management with React useState working
